channel.title: Our Courses on ModernApps Ninja Home
channel.description: Recent content in Our Courses on ModernApps Ninja Home

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu 101
item.description: About Course vSphere with Tanzu: application-focused management for streamlined development, agile operations, and accelerated innovation.

item.title: vSphere with Tanzu 201
item.description: About Course vSphere with Tanzu: application-focused management for streamlined development, agile operations, and accelerated innovation.

item.title: Introduction to the VMware Tanzu Portfolio
item.description: This course provides a high level introduction to the the Tanzu Family of products, the vision for the portfolio, and a brief introduction to each of the products & solutions in the portfolio.

item.title: ModernApps Ninja 101
item.description: About Course The ModernApps Ninja program is much more than just the learning portal and is really intended to be an active community of professionals learning and working towards applying new skills in cloud native technologies.

item.title: Tanzu Kubernetes Grid 101
item.description: About Course This Course provides an introductory technical overview of VMware Tanzu Kubernetes Grid including all editions.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control 101
item.description: About Course This course provides an introduction to VMware Tanzu Mission Control.

item.title: Tanzu Mission Control 201
item.description: About Course Tanzu Mission Control 201 follows the TMC 101 course to provide the next level of technical overview and hands on exercises exploring the features of Tanzu Mission ControlRequirements Before taking this course, please complete the Tanzu Mission Control 101 Course
